definition: to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The Four Seas Xianting fly short Zhao, the Shenzhou held fire cherry Xie.
sentences.chinese: 四海閒庭飛短棹，神州舉火櫻花謝。
